seo: SCA,合规规则,自动生成,CVE数据,漏洞检测
seo_en: SCA, compliance rules, auto generation, CVE data, vulnerability detection
summary: 该插件通过CVE数据生成简单的SCA合规规则，用于检测特定产品版本范围内的漏洞。
summary_en: This plugin generates simple SCA compliance rules based on CVE data to detect vulnerabilities within specific product version ranges.
